original_title: UFC Fight Night 36: Machida vs. Mousasi
overview: UFC Fight Night 36: Machida vs. Mousasi was a mixed martial arts event held on February 15, 2014, at the Arena Jaraguá in Jaraguá do Sul, Brazil. The event was headlined by a middleweight bout between former world champions Lyoto Machida and Gegard Mousasi.
title: UFC Fight Night 36: Machida vs. Mousasi
